item.title: GenAI is Being Adopted Faster than PCs or the Internet
item.description: Generative AI is being adopted faster than both PCs and the internet! A new study from the Harvard Kennedy School, Vanderbilt, and the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis reveals that 39.4% of the U.S. working-age population has used AI, with 32% using it weekly. Explore the studyâ€™s findings on workplace adoption, AI's impact on different job sectors, and how AI is already shaping the economy and labor force... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/f7cac464/podcast/rss

item.title: MMN 10/3/24
item.description: -Israel kills US citizen in Lebanon -Doctors who worked in Gaza urgen Biden to cut off weapons to IDF -Private equity funneled $1 trillion to dirty energy -Working Class History: Hollywood Black Friday Feed: https://meanstv.libsyn.com/rss
